subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Women)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Connecticut Coach Geno Auriemma said he was eager to coach a chastened team, one that has plenty of time to regroup and improve and win its eighth national title since 1995.
snippet: Connecticut Coach Geno Auriemma said he was eager to coach a chastened team, one that has plenty of time to regroup and improve and win its eighth national title since 1995.
